casebody.data:
Christopher W. GRENIER, Paul C. Bock, and Todd M. Shea, Petitioners, v. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Respondent. No. 05-3213. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. July 14, 2006.

Before MICHEL, Chief Judge, RADER and SCHALL, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
